Scene : 14
<HEro is writing a script while swarna call him.
<Hero picks the mobile in hand and wait untill it get the last ring..

Hero : Helloâ€¦
Swarna : Ha .. HIâ€¦!
Hero : Hiâ€¦(takes some time) enti intha late night call chesaru.
Swarna : chesaru na..?
Hero : sorry .. chesavuuu..

Hero: paledhu .. cheppandiâ€¦ i mean cheppu

Hero : Adhi adagadaniki call chesava?
Swarna : ha..
Hero : Ya Ya.. you are welcome
Swarna  : Ante adhi chinnappatinundi chaduvu, studies ane pencharu ma daddy . Nenu okkasari kuda movie shootings chudaledhu .so 
Hero : idli oka issue ena ..? shoot appdu definate ga pilusta.. chaduvu kakunda ee prapancham lo inka chala unayi.
Swarna : exactly.. Oka middle class family lo untu baga chaduvutav ani noted aythe . school ki bag tho paatu valla expectations kuda carry cheyyali..iâ€™ve literally got no time for anything .
Hero : Donâ€™t worry. Iâ€™ll show you the best part of the world.. ippatiki selavu.. night aindhi kada.ðŸ˜†
